questions.title: For a group presentation I like to help organize the group's efforts
For a group presentation I like to contribute something that is uniquely mine, often based on how I feel
For a group presentation I prefer to draw all the pictures
For a group presentation I prefer to organize and classify the information into categories so it makes sense
If something breaks and won't work I tend to study the diagram of how it works
For a group presentation I prefer to put new words to a popular tune or use music
If something breaks and won't work I try to find someone who can help me
If something breaks and won't work I tend to tap my fingers to a beat while I figure it out
In an argument I tend ask a friend or some person in authority for help
If something breaks down, I look around me to try and see what I can find to fix the problem

In an argument I try to keep my distance, keep silent or visualize some solution

In a magazine, I prefer looking at the pictures rather than reading the text
Friends ask my advice because I seem to be a natural leader
If something breaks and won't work, I wonder if it's worth fixing up

In an argument I will usually walk away until I calm down
I enjoy learning the names of living things in our environment, such as flowers and trees
If I have to memorize something I tend to close my eyes and feel the situation

If I have to memorize something, I tend to organize it into categories

I tend to tap my fingers or play with my pencil during class
I find that I am strong_willed, independent and don't follow the crowd

I an argument I tend to shout or punch or move in some sort of rhythm
If I have to memorize something I write it out a number of times until I know it

I have several very close friends
I know what I am good at and what I am weak at
I use a lot of body movements when talking
I like talking and writing about my ideas

As an adult, I think I would like to get away from the city and enjoy nature

I don't like crowds

activites: Edit a written piece or work
Apply positive or negative 'spin' to a story
linguistic.description: You enjoy playing with words, both in writing and speech. Whether it's explaining ideas, writing speeches, or adding a special touch to stories, you're the go_to person for all things language_related. Think of yourself as a linguistic wizard, easily understanding the connection between words and their deeper meanings. You might fancy being a writer, journalist, or someone who can make any piece of writing shine. In a nutshell, you're the language maestro, turning every sentence into a masterpiece.

activites: Coach someone to play a musical instrument
Specify mood music for telephone systems and receptions
musical.description: You find joy in the language of music, where every note and rhythm speaks to your soul. Whether performing a beautiful melody, singing a heartfelt song, or coaching someone in the art of playing an instrument, you thrive in the world of sound and rhythm. Imagine yourself as a musical maestro, creating harmonies that resonate with emotions. If you're passionate about music, envision a future as a musician, singer, or composer, where every sound becomes a masterpiece in your hands.

activites: Create a process to measure something difficult
Analyze how a machine works; create a process
Devise a strategy to achieve an aim
Assess the value of a business or a proposition
logical_mathematical.description: You thrive in the world of logic and numbers, where your mind dances with patterns and scientific puzzles. Whether it's tackling complex mathematical calculations or devising strategies to achieve goals, you revel in the precision of cause and effect. Picture yourself as the Sherlock Holmes of problem_solving, making sense of intricate machines and creating processes with ease. If you enjoy the thrill of unraveling mysteries through logical thinking, your journey might lead you to become a scientist, engineer, or computer expert, where numbers and logic are your trusted companions.
faculties: Faculty of Computers and Information Sciences
Faculty of Economics and Political Science

activites: Create a mime to explain something
bodily_kinesthetic.description: You thrive in the world of movement and physical expression, where your body becomes a canvas for agility and coordination. Whether it's dancing, demonstrating a sports technique, or crafting a mime to convey a message, you find joy in the art of bodily_kinaesthetic intelligence. Imagine yourself as a performer, athlete, or even an adventurer, where every action is a testament to your physical prowess. If you revel in hands_on experiences, envision a future as a dancer, athlete, or even a healer, where touch and movement become your language of expression.
faculties: Faculty of Tourism and Hotel Management

activites: Create a room layout; create a corporate logo
Pack a suitcase or the boot of a car
spatial_visual.description: You have a natural gift for seeing and creating visual wonders, where images come to life in your mind's eye. Whether designing a costume, interpreting a painting, or crafting a room layout, you revel in the world of visual and spatial perception. Imagine yourself as an artist, architect, or designer, where every stroke and shape tells a unique story. If you enjoy bringing ideas to life through images and spaces, envision a future filled with creativity and innovation in the realms of art, design, or architecture.
faculties: Faculty of Urban and Regional Planning

activites: Affect the feelings of others in a planned way
interpersonal.description: You thrive in the realm of understanding people, where feelings and relationships are your canvas. Imagine yourself as a compassionate guide, whether as a therapist, counselor, or leader, with an innate ability to interpret emotions and connect with others. If you enjoy reading facial expressions, expressing feelings through body language, or influencing others positively, envision a future where your interpersonal intelligence transforms human connections. Your journey could lead you to roles in counseling, HR, or any field where human contact, communication, and teamwork are key.

activites: Keep a personal journal to express thoughts and emotions
Practice mindfulness meditation to increase self_awareness
Travel alone to new places, providing opportunities for self_discovery and independence
Attend workshops or courses focused on emotional intelligence
intrapersonal.description: You possess a remarkable gift for self_awareness, navigating the intricate landscape of your own thoughts, beliefs, and reactions to the world. Picture yourself as a thoughtful architect, shaping your personal aims and changes with quiet determination. If you find joy in self_reflection, deciding on your own developmental path, and considering your place in the realm of Emotional Intelligence, envision a future where your intrapersonal intelligence guides you on a journey of self_discovery and growth.

activites: Start a garden to cultivate plants, flowers, or vegetables
Develop an interest in bird watching
Engage in outdoor activities such as camping, hiking or fishing
naturalist.description: Nature is your classroom, and you're the expert explorer. If you resonate with naturalist intelligence, your world is filled with the wonders of botany, biology, and zoology. Whether camping under the stars, nurturing a garden, or hiking through untouched landscapes, you find your joy in the great outdoors. The role of a biologist, conservationist, gardener, or farmer beckons, aligning perfectly with your passion for the environment. As a natural smart, you thrive in understanding, cataloging, and caring for the diverse species that make up our world.
